member.name: M:AJP.JsonElementExtensions.AddProperty(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method which recreates a new JsonElement from an existing one, with an extra property added along the way
member.param: A string containing the name of the property to add
The value of the property to add
member.returns: A new JsonElement containing the old properties plus the new property

member.name: M:AJP.JsonElementExtensions.RemoveProperty(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.String)
member.summary: Method which recreates a new JsonElement from an existing one, but without one of the exiting properties
member.param: A string containing the name of the property to remove
member.returns: A new JsonElement containing the old properties apart from the named property to remove

member.name: M:AJP.JsonElementExtensions.RemoveProperties(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Method which recreates a new JsonElement from an existing one, but without some of the exiting properties
member.param: A list of names of the properties to remove
member.returns: A new JsonElement without the properties listed

member.name: M:AJP.JsonElementExtensions.ParseAsJsonStringAndMutate(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.Action{System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String}})
member.summary: Method which recreates a new JsonElement from an existing one, with the opportunity to add new and remove existing properties
member.param: An Action of Utf8JsonWriter, which allows the calling code to write additional properties, its possible to add highly complex nested structures
A list of names of the existing properties to remove from the resulting JsonElement

member.name: M:AJP.JsonElementExtensions.GetProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Method which returns a list of property name and value, from a given object
